query()

query(array  $query, boolean  $override = false) : object

Associative array of query string values to add to the request.

Parameters

array $query

Associative array of query string values
boolean $override

If true override all currently stored query values with the new values being provided

Returns

object —

This Okta\Request object

Tags

None found

json()

json(array  $data, boolean  $override = false) : object

The json option is used to easily upload JSON encoded data as the body of a request. A Content-Type header of application/json will be added if no Content-Type header is already present on the message.

Alias: $this->data()

Parameters

array $data

Any PHP type that can be operated on by PHP's json_encode() function.
boolean $override

If true override all currently stored json data with the new data being provided

Returns

object —

This Okta\Request object

Tags

None found

Parameters

boolean $override

Returns

object —

Tags

timeout()

timeout(float  $seconds) : object

Float describing the timeout of the request in seconds. Use 0 to wait indefinitely (the default behavior).

Parameters

float $seconds

Seconds to wait before request times out

Returns

object —

This Okta\Request object

Tags

None found

assoc()

assoc(boolean  $assoc) : object

When true, returned objects will be converted into associative arrays.

Parameters

boolean $assoc

Wether or not to return associative arrays

Returns
